modName: Summonable Golden Saints and Dark Seducers
summary: Adds two new spells, as well as playable races:  Golden Saints and Dark Seducers!  Master level summons.
descriptionHtml:
Adds two new spells, as well as playable races:  Golden Saints and Dark Seducers!  Master level summons.  Requires Dawnguard.

ALSO includes a super secret summon as a bonus.  I\\\'ll give you a hint to where you can find its tome:  It is in one of the new areas introduce in the Dawnguard DLC.  Also I hope that that is enough proof to let people know that this dlc requires Dawnguard.

Heck, might as well put it in all caps.

THIS DLC REQUIRES DAWNGUARD

*Notice about pictures*
In my Nexus version, the Golden Saints armor is using vanilla armor.  If you want to replace the Nif of the armor of your choice, go to skyrim\\\\Data\\\\meshes\\\\dlc01\\\\Armor\\\\ivory\\\\f\\\\GS Armor and change cuirassivory_1 to whatever you desire.
author: Buffscale McThundertail
